metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12457 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in wolfSSL before 4.5.0. It mishandles thechange_cipher_spec (CCS) message processing logic for TLS 1.3. If anattacker sends ChangeCipherSpec messages in a crafted way involving morethan one in a row, the server becomes stuck in the ProcessReply() loop,i.e., a denial of service.

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
